text: This family showed up at the Virginia governors mansion to call for Northam to go and be replaced by Lt Gov Fairfax. They were disappointed to find that protesters here earlier were gone.

text: This monument to the civil rights movement stands on the grounds of the Virginia Governor’s Mansion. Gov Northam will hold a press conference inside that mansion soon, where he will explain why a picture of a person in blackface and another in KKK garb is on his yearbook page.
